CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatic handsfree
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically enable/disable handsfree when the phone is far/close to your ear.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Enable delay
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Delay time for automatically turning ON handsfree when the phone is NOT close to your ear.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Enable on call start
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Enable handsfree when the call begins.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Delay on start
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Delay time for automatically turning ON the handsfree when call begins.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Speaker volume
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Volume to set when the handsfree is automatically enabled.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Silent call end
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turn off handsfree on call end, just before the call end sound is played.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Limit to Enable
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: How many times up to automatically enable the handsfree during one call when the phone is far from ear.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Limit to Disable
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: How many times up to automatically disable the handsfree during one call when the phone is close to ear.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify timeout
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify when automatic restoration from silent/airplane mode is active.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify turning off
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify when devices are automatically turned off by Sanity.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify restoring
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify when devices are automatically restored by Sanity.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify running
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify if Sanity is running when a phone call starts.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify volume
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify when volume is automatically changed by Sanity.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify headsets
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify when headsets are connected or disconnected.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify recording
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify when audio recording is stopped by Sanity.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify call blocking
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify the last blocked call on the status bar.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify SMS blocking
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify the last blocked SMS on the status bar.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify if anonymous
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Notify when the outgoing call is anonymous (in all cases you won't be notified when not anonymous)."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable announce
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Speak the caller's name when a call is received (while the phone rings)."

Preference.android:title: Global settings
Preference.android:summary: Tap here to open the Android global settings about the \"text to speech\" engine.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Headset only
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable announce only if the headsets are connected.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip if silent
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Don't announce the caller when the phone is in silent mode."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Mute ringtone
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Mute the ringtone when announcing the caller's name."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Announcement volume
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose the volume level used to announce calls.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Voice tone
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: "Choose the voice tone for announcing the caller's name."
"How many times the caller's name will be spoken when ringing."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Pause between repeats
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: "How long to wait before announcing again the caller's name."

cri.sanity.pref.PEdit.android:summary: "Choose what to speak BEFORE the caller's name."
"Choose what to speak AFTER the caller's name."
Type the word \"Anonymous\" in your language to announce anonymous calls.
Type the word \"Unknown\" in your language to announce caller is not in contacts.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Alternate audio
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Use an alternate audio stream for announcing. Enable this option only if you cannot hear the announcement (try it hereunder).

Preference.android:summary: Tap here to try announcing using current options.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable announce SMS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Speak the name of the sender when receiving a SMS (only the sender's name is announced, NOT the message content)."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: SMS Volume
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose the volume level used to announce SMS.

cri.sanity.pref.PEdit.android:title: Prefix (SMS)
cri.sanity.pref.PEdit.android:summary: "Choose what to speak BEFORE the sender's name."

cri.sanity.pref.PEdit.android:title: Suffix (SMS)
cri.sanity.pref.PEdit.android:summary: "Choose what to speak AFTER the sender's name."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Shared filter (TTS)
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If activated, use the filter of the call announcer. Otherwise you can choose a specific filter to announce SMS.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Choose date and time
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If disabled, the filter will be always enabled.

Preference.android:title: New range
Preference.android:summary: "Tap here to create a new time range. If you don't create time ranges, the filter will be enabled for the entire day."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Phone volume
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Volume to automatically set during a call while no headsets are used.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Wired headsets
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Volume to automatically set during a call while using wired headsets.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Bluetooth headsets
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Volume to automatically set during a call while using wireless headsets.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Conversation only
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Play only the audio of the conversation, muting any other audio stream during phone calls.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Announcement volume
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose the volume level used to announce calls.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: SMS Volume
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose the volume level used to announce SMS.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn off in proximity
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turn OFF devices only when the phone is close to your ear. (If disabled, turn off when call start.)

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Turn off delay
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Delay time for turning OFF devices when your ear is close to phone.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn on if far
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turn ON devices (turned off by Sanity) during a call when the phone is NOT close to your ear.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Restore delay
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Delay time for turning ON devices when the phone is NOT close to your ear.

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Use administrator privileges for turning off screen when you put the phone close to your ear during a call.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn off screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Force to turn OFF the screen during call when the phone is close to your ear.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn on screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Force to turn ON the screen during call when the phone is far from your ear.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Vibrate at the beginning
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Vibrate when an outgoing call begins.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Vibrate at the end
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Vibrate when a phone call ends.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Vibration mode
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose how to vibrate the phone.

Preference.android:title: Vibration test
Preference.android:summary: Tap here to test the vibration mode.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable auto answer
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable automatic answering on incoming calls.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Headset only
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable automatic answering only if the headsets are connected.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip if silent
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Don't answer automatically when the phone is in silent mode."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Delay of answer
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Delay time before answering automatically.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Alternative answer
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Use an alternative way to answer. Check it only if the automatic answer doesn't work on your phone."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable urgent calls
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "If disabled, your phone will never ring when it's in silent mode. If enabled, you can choose which calls will always ring or vibrate."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip if vibrate
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Don't enable urgent calls if the phone is set to vibrate in silent mode."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Urgent mode
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose if ring or vibrate on urgent incoming calls.

Preference.android:title: Fast search
Preference.android:summary: Tap here for fast searching of a contact.
Application main options.
Options for recording call audio on memory card.

Preference.android:title: Call blocker
Preference.android:summary: Block incoming calls and SMS filtering out the phone number of the caller.

Preference.android:title: Announce caller
Preference.android:summary: Speak the name of the caller when receiving a call or a SMS.

Preference.android:title: Urgent calls
Preference.android:summary: "Choose what phone numbers your phone will ring or vibrate also when it's in silent mode."

Preference.android:title: Auto answer
Preference.android:summary: Rules to answer automatically on incoming calls.

Preference.android:title: Anonymous calls
Preference.android:summary: Rules to dial anonymous call (automatically hide your caller ID).
Options for automatic handsfree activation.
Which devices should be enabled or disabled to reduce electromagnetic waves during a call.
Options for enabling and disabling devices during a call by checking proximity sensor.
Options for automatic volume setting during a call.
Choose which the special events which vibrate the phone.
Choose when Sanity should show notifications.

Preference.android:title: About and contacts
Preference.android:summary: Information about this application and tools for contacting the developer.

Preference.android:title: How to uninstall
Preference.android:summary: Tap here to show instructions for uninstalling Sanity (useful only on Android Froyo 2.2 or greater).
Sanity is free. If you like this application, support the development with a donation.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable call blocker
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable call blocking system to refuse incoming calls.

Preference.android:title: Choice of method
Preference.android:summary: Tap here to show the description of all call block methods.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Block method
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose how to block incoming calls.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Restore the signal
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose when to restore the signal after the call has been blocked.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Pick up before block
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Pick up (answer) the incoming calls just before block. It may be useful to prevent diversions to voicemail.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip if silent
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Don't block incoming calls when the phone is in silent mode."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify call blocking
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify the last blocked call on the status bar.

Preference.android:summary: Show the detailed list of all blocked calls.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable SMS blocker
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable SMS blocking system to automatically delete unwanted messages.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify SMS blocking
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify the last blocked SMS on the status bar.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Shared filter (SMS)
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If activated, use the filter of the call blocker to block the SMS also. Otherwise you can choose a specific filter to block SMS.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: History size
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose how many blocked SMS should be kept in the history.

Preference.android:summary: Show the detailed list of recent blocked SMS messages.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable anonymous calls
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Choose to enable or disable automatic anonymous outgoing calls completely.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Confirm calls
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, Sanity will ask you to confirm if the outgoing call should be anonymous.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify if anonymous
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Notify when the outgoing call is anonymous (in all cases you won't be notified when not anonymous)."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose your country to set the dialing prefix used for hiding your caller ID.

cri.sanity.pref.PEdit.android:title: Anonymous prefix
cri.sanity.pref.PEdit.android:summary: "The custom prefix used for hiding your caller ID. If you don't know it, choose your country."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable filtering
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable phone number filtering.

Preference.android:title: Date and time
Preference.android:summary: Choose when this filter should be enabled.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Filter mode
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose to include or exclude the phone numbers in the following list.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: All numbers
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: All phone numbers.
All anonymous phone numbers.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: All unknowns
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "All non-anonymous unknown phone numbers (don't stored in contacts)."

Preference.android:title: User list
Preference.android:summary: "List of phone numbers don't stored in contacts."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: All contacts
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: All phone numbers in contacts.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: All favourites
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: All contacts you tagged as favourites.

Preference.android:title: Contacts list
Preference.android:summary: Choose the phone contacts in this list.

Preference.android:title: Groups list
Preference.android:summary: Choose the groups of contacts in this list.
Choose the phone number prefixes in this list.

Preference.android:title: Clear all
Preference.android:summary: Remove all history entries.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Sanity
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Enable or disable whole Sanity system. If disabled, this application won't affect phone calls."

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Quick start
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Quick start of Sanity during calls and SMS (the application process will always stay in memory as background service).

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: SMS alert
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show each new incoming SMS asking you to reply.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Silent mode Timeout
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Each time you activate the Silent mode, Sanity will ask you to choose a timeout for restoring automatically the Normal mode.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Airplane mode Timeout
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Each time you activate the Ariplane mode, Sanity will ask you to choose a timeout for restoring automatically the Normal mode.
Use administrator privileges for turning off screen when you put the phone close to your ear during a call.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Force BT audio
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Force bluetooth audio device to be correctly handled by Sanity.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Reverse proximity
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Check this option only if Sanity enable/disable handsfree or devices in a wrong way when the phone is far/close to your ear.

Preference.android:summary: Manage settings profiles to quickly change more preferences in one fell swoop.

Preference.android:title: Backup and Restore
Preference.android:summary: Tap here to backup/restore all current preferences to/from memory card.

Preference.android:title: Delete filters
Preference.android:summary: Delete all call filters currently configured.

Preference.android:title: Reset to default
Preference.android:summary: Set default values for all application preferences.

cri.sanity.pref.PPwd.android:summary: Set a global password for changing the options and for accessing to the resources of Sanity.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Visible passwords
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Always show passwords using readable text.

Preference.android:title: Legal notes
Preference.android:summary: Attention please: in some countries call recording is forbidden by government laws. The author disagrees every illegal use of Sanity. Be aware, use it at your risk!

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable recorder
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Put recording notification on statusbar during phone call: tap that notification to start/stop call recording.

Preference.android:title: Browse recorded files
Preference.android:summary: Show list of audio files recorded by Sanity (stored in \"Sanity\" folder inside memory card).

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Multimedia scanner
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allow system multimedia scanner to track audio files recorded by Sanity.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Audio format
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Select file format used to save audio file recordings.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Audio source
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Select the source device used for recording audio. Attention: many phones are limited to Microphone as only working one!

Preference.android:title: Important notes
Preference.android:summary: Android recording system is very limited: actually you can record calls only when HANDSFREE IS TURNED ON!

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatic start
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Enable automatic START recording. If disabled, Sanity won't start recording automatically."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Start delay
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Delay time for starting audio recording automatically.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Call type
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose call directions for starting audio recording.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Handsfree ON
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatic start audio recording when handsfree is turned on by Sanity.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Headsets (start)
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Headset rules about automatic start audio recording.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Max start times
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Maximum times to start automatic recording during a single call.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatic stop
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: "Enable automatic STOP recording. If disabled, you'll have to stop manually."

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Stop delay
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Delay for stopping audio recording automatically.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Handsfree OFF
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatic stop audio recording when handsfree is turned off by Sanity.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Headsets (stop)
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Headset rules about automatic stop audio recording.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Time limit
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Choose the maximum duration of one audio recording. Sanity will stop the recording after this time.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Automatic removal
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Automatically remove the old recordings. Choose how long to keep the recordings.

Preference.android:title: Recent changes
Preference.android:summary: Show recent changes about last Sanity versions.

Preference.android:title: Official Forum
Preference.android:summary: "Tap here to open the official website of the developer's forum. You can also use the forum for reporting bugs and for requesting features."

Preference.android:title: Leave a comment
Preference.android:summary: "You are invited to leave a comment about Sanity on Market. Tap here to open Market. Please don't report bugs in Market comments."

Preference.android:title: Mail to developer
Preference.android:summary: Tap here to write an email to the developer. Use the FORUM for any question about Sanity!

Preference.android:title: PayPal donate
Preference.android:summary: In addition to Market, you can donate using PayPal. Once you complete the donation, the author will send you the donation version. Tap here to open the PayPal site.

Preference.android:title: License GNU GPL v3
Preference.android:summary: Tap here to open the official web site of the GNU General Public License version 3.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn off Mobile Data
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable Mobile Data (2G/3G) during a call (it will be restored at call end). It works with many phone models, but not with all.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn off Wifi
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable Wifi during a call (it will be restored at call end).

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn off Bluetooth
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable Bluetooth during a call (it will be restored at call end).

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn off GPS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable GPS during a call (it will be restored at call end). It works with many phone models, but not with all.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip BT if connected
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Skip automatic Bluetooth disabling during a call if there are Bluetooth devices connected to phone.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip Mobile Data if GPS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Skip automatic Mobile Data (2G/3G) disabling during a call when GPS is enabled.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip if Hotspot Wifi
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Skip automatic Mobile Data (2G/3G) and Wifi disabling during a call if phone is configured like Router Wifi.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Skip if Tethering USB
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Skip automatic Mobile Data disabling during a call if Tethering USB is enabled.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Turn on Bluetooth
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turn on Bluetooth when call starts. This can be helpful for automatic Bluetooth headsets connection.

cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:title: Bluetooth Timeout
cri.sanity.pref.PList.android:summary: Timeout for turning off Bluetooth if no headsets were connected.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Always turn BT off
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: In all cases Bluetooth will be turned off when call ends.
